description:
BasiliskLLM: Simplify LLM interactions with multi-chat, image analysis, and NVDA integration. Securely manage credentials and auto-update for seamless use with models like OpenAI and Anthropic. Perfect for users and developers.

BasiliskLLM is a user-friendly tool designed to simplify interactions with large language models (LLMs). Inspired by OpenAI's NVDA add-on, this application is perfect for various users, including those who prefer screen readers. It supports various LLMs like Anthropic, Gemini, and OpenAI, allowing you to chat with multiple models simultaneously. Key features include multi-chat and multi-conversation support, image analysis, speech-to-text conversion, and seamless NVDA integration for enhanced accessibility. BasiliskLLM offers automatic updates and secure credential management. It's available as a traditional installer or portable version for Windows systems, catering to diverse preferences.
